title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: BYOB Series 1 #058LOT 2: Silver Shield CryptocurrenyLOT 3: BitPay Dogecoin x2LOT 4: BitPay Bitcoin x2LOT 5: Sol Noctis Binary Eagle x4*Lots 3,4,5 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctionsSTARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0021BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 5th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Lot 1- 0.0021Lot 5 - 1@ 0.0021Does Lot 1 come with the holograms?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on February 28, 2023, 02:07:02 PMLot 1- 0.0021Lot 5 - 1@ 0.0021Does Lot 1 come with the holograms? yeah.. I'll toss in 2x of the BYOB holos

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: the only byob I dont have! Lot 1: .0025 BTC

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 2: 0.0021Lot 3: 0.0021 eachCan't clearly see it from the pictures, but these are all 1 oz silver coins, right?In the unlikely event that not: Please consider my bids invalid.Also, any info on mintage regarding the Bitpays and the Silvershield? Thanks.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Lot 5: 4 @ 0.01BTC Surprised they didn't grade higher, they must have been stored for a while or something. Sweet selection.... I think I know whose coins these are, but not 100%... Just a guess...  Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 12:01:06 AMCan't clearly see it from the pictures, but these are all 1 oz silver coins, right?In the unlikely event that not: Please consider my bids invalid.I'm 99.9% sure they are all .999 ag, but we'll let mr. jones answer.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 28, 2023, 03:19:49 PMLot 1: .0025 BTCQuote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 12:01:06 AMLot 2: 0.0021Lot 3: 0.0021 eachQuote from: owlcatz on March 01, 2023, 02:53:21 AMLot 5: 4 @ 0.01BTC Current high bidsQuote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 12:01:06 AMCan't clearly see it from the pictures, but these are all 1 oz silver coins, right?In the unlikely event that not: Please consider my bids invalid.Also, any info on mintage regarding the Bitpays and the Silvershield? Thanks.  Yes, every coin listed is a 1oz silver coinThe starting bids reflect silver spot price plus the grading fee.Quote from: owlcatz on March 01, 2023, 02:53:21 AMLot 5: 4 @ 0.01BTC Surprised they didn't grade higher, they must have been stored for a while or something. Sweet selection.... I think I know whose coins these are, but not 100%... Just a guess...  I'm 99.9% sure they are all .999 ag, but we'll let mr. jones answer. Yeah.. not sure why all of these got a less than excellent grade.And yes.. all 0.999 silver

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on March 01, 2023, 02:53:21 AMLot 5: 4 @ 0.01BTC Surprised they didn't grade higher, they must have been stored for a while or something. Sweet selection.... I think I know whose coins these are, but not 100%... Just a guess...  Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 12:01:06 AMCan't clearly see it from the pictures, but these are all 1 oz silver coins, right?In the unlikely event that not: Please consider my bids invalid.I'm 99.9% sure they are all .999 ag, but we'll let mr. jones answer. True, these ratings are hella low, do they come with big fingerprints on them or what?Joking aside, cool coins, I think a decent crypto collector needs some Doge stuff every once in a while. Still: Any info on mintages? Silver shield usually go with very low numbers if I recall correctly.

comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 01:48:07 PMQuote from: owlcatz on March 01, 2023, 02:53:21 AMLot 5: 4 @ 0.01BTC Surprised they didn't grade higher, they must have been stored for a while or something. Sweet selection.... I think I know whose coins these are, but not 100%... Just a guess...  Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 01, 2023, 12:01:06 AMCan't clearly see it from the pictures, but these are all 1 oz silver coins, right?In the unlikely event that not: Please consider my bids invalid.I'm 99.9% sure they are all .999 ag, but we'll let mr. jones answer. True, these ratings are hella low, do they come with big fingerprints on them or what?Joking aside, cool coins, I think a decent crypto collector needs some Doge stuff every once in a while. Still: Any info on mintages? Silver shield usually go with very low numbers if I recall correctly.For the Silver Shield coin, 1501 were minted: https://www.goldenstatemint.com/MiniMintage-by-Silver-Shield-exclusively-at-GSM.htmlFor the BTC and Doge BitPay rounds, I am unable to find a mintage number.They do not specifiy on the main sales page. Guess they were a collab between BitPay and APMEX:https://www.apmex.com/product/228315/1-oz-silver-round-bitpayhttps://www.apmex.com/product/233048/1-oz-silver-round-dogecoin-round
